summary: Completed comprehensive testing of course filter functionality on Courses page. All filter categories working correctly with expected course counts.
passed_tests: Development filter shows exactly 2 courses (Front-end and Back-end)
Design filter shows exactly 1 course (Graphic Design)
Office filter shows exactly 1 course (Microsoft Office)
Kids filter shows exactly 1 course (IT for Kids)
Reset to All filter works correctly (shows 6 courses again)
Filter buttons are clickable and responsive
Course filtering logic using useMemo works properly
Category comparison (course.category vs filter value) working correctly
Filter button styling and active state working correctly
